title: Did legislators who had started raw milk get sick of drinking raw milk to celebrate it?
subtitle: An investigation by the West Virginia Health Department was inconclusive, although evidence suggests that the perpetrator could have been a stomach flu.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Following the approval of a bill to legalize the consumption of raw milk in the state, many members of the West Virginia Legislature were sick of drinking raw milk to celebrate the bill that became law.
